page.title: 04ALWAY ESTATE.NEWPORT.GWENT.
page.content: {Alway Estate}is the name of a council owned housing estate in Newport. It was built about forty years ago and now Newport Borough Council is going to spend a lot of money modernising the houses there. This needs to be done urgently, which is why the scheme is called the{Alway {Priority Estate Project. } As part of the project, two open spaces in the estate are to be turned into children's playground. These are in Parry Drive and Mount Bax. Some people involved with this scheme have visited our school, Hartridge Comprehensive, and told us that we could enter a competition to design these playgrounds. They left us catalogues to show what sort of play-things we could use. We have been drawing our plans in our normal Art Lessons.
